4.m: Moses said to the people, 'Do not fear, for God has come to test you, that the fear of him may be before you, that you may not sin.' - Exodus 20:20 (ESV)

l.q: Who gave the Israelites the 10 Commandments?
l.a: God gave the Israelites the 10 Commandments.

l.q: What does Exodus 20:1-7 tell us about God?
l.a: Exodus 20:1-7 tell us that there is only 1 God. He tells His people that they should worship only Him. God is a jealous God, and there are consequences for those who hate him, but steadfast love to those who obey Him.

l.q: Who defines what is sinful to God and man?
l.a: It is God who defines what is sinful. He is the standard of holiness.
